example.eg: Many people never get beyond the elementary rules of grammar.
example.egtrans: 除了基础的规则，许多人一直都不甚了解语法。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 根本的, 基本的, 基础的

example.eg: The first chapters are elementary and meant to encourage beginners.
example.egtrans: 前几章很简单，是鼓励初学者的。

example.eg: They've decided to send their children to a private elementary school.
example.egtrans: 他们决定送自己的孩子去上私立小学。

example.eg: Children usually start elementary school at five or six years old.  My wife taught elementary school.
example.egtrans: 孩子们通常在五六岁的时候开始上小学。我的妻子是小学老师。

example.eg: Ms. Talton is an excellent elementary school teacher.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 初等教育, 初级教育, 基础教育

example.eg: In the US, most kids learn how to read and do arithmetic in their primary education.
